sourcesContent:
import React, {useCallback} from 'react'
import {OrderIconWrapper, RecordCardWrapper} from '../atoms'
import {Col, Row} from 'antd'
import {Title} from '../../../UIComponents/Typography/Title'
import {Text} from '../../../UIComponents/Typography/Text'
import {Avatar} from '../../../UIComponents/Avatar'
import {RecordsTimeSvg} from '../../../Icons/Time'
import {EventSvg} from '../../../Icons/Event'
import {ShieldDoneSvg} from '../../../Icons/Shield'
import {StarSvg} from '../../../Icons/Start'
import {SchoolSvg} from '../../../Icons/School'
import {OfficialSvg} from '../../../Icons/Official'
import {useTranslation} from 'react-i18next'
import {QuickResponseCodeSvg} from '../../../Icons/QRCode'

export const RecordCard = ({name, category, src, status, meet, date}) => {
    const {t} = useTranslation()
    
    const generateStatus = useCallback((statuses) => {
        switch (statuses) {
            case -1:
                return <OrderIconWrapper><OfficialSvg/>{t('canceled')}</OrderIconWrapper>
            case 0:
                return <OrderIconWrapper><SchoolSvg/>{t('awaiting')}</OrderIconWrapper>
            case 1:
                return <OrderIconWrapper><StarSvg/>{t('approved')}</OrderIconWrapper>
            case 2:
                return <OrderIconWrapper><QuickResponseCodeSvg/>{t('scanned')}</OrderIconWrapper>
            case 5:
                return <OrderIconWrapper><ShieldDoneSvg/>{t('finished')}</OrderIconWrapper>
            
            default:
                return null
        }
    }, [t])
    
    
    return (
        <RecordCardWrapper>
            <Row gutter={[0, 12]}>
                <Col span={24}>
                    <Row wrap={false} gutter={[4, 0]} justify='space-between'>
                        <Col>
                            <Title>{name}</Title>
                            <Text>{category}</Text>
                        </Col>
                        <Col>
                            <Avatar size={36} imgUrl={src}/>
                        </Col>
                    </Row>
                </Col>
                <Col span={24}>
                    <Row wrap={false}>
                        <Col>
                            <RecordsTimeSvg/> {meet}
                        </Col>
                        <Col>
                            <EventSvg/> {date}
                        </Col>
                        <Col>
                            {generateStatus(status)}
                        </Col>
                    </Row>
                </Col>
            </Row>
        </RecordCardWrapper>
    )
}
